title: ‘One of the oldest hatreds’: Netanyahu sees new source of antisemitism
description: “There are many, many blessings of the internet age, but it comes also with a curse. And the curse is polarization,” Israeli Prime Minister-designate Benjamin Netanyahu said.

title: No support for Trump’s ‘termination’ of Constitution, but Republicans decline to condemn him
description: “I can't be really chasing every one of these crazy statements that come out,” Rep. David Joyce said.
